heading: Quinto (Drum) music.
general-note: Here are entered compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for one performer playing quinto (drum), and collections of compositions in several forms or types for one performer playing quinto (drum)..

The term "quinto (drum)" is used as a medium of performance in headings for works for one or two solo instruments. In headings for other works that include the quinto drum, the generic term "percussion" is used as the medium of performance..
